tool.name: OGS: queryMesh
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'queryMesh'.
tool.command: for i in $mesh_file; do if [ "$i" != "None" ] && [ ! -e "$(basename $i)" ]; then ln -s "$i" "$(basename $i)"; fi; done; queryMesh #if str($element_id).strip() != 'None' and str($element_id).strip() != '': --element-id '$element_id' #end if #if str($node_id).strip() != 'None' and str($node_id).strip() != '': --node-id '$node_id' #end if $show_node_with_max_elements $mesh_file.element_identifier

param.name: show_node_with_max_elements
param.label: show node with max elements
param.help: show a node having the max number of connected elements

tool.help: This tool runs the **queryMesh** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
